attributes.action: Stop shops from closing at 4 on a Sunday
attributes.background: Always need to go to the shop on a Sunday and they're never open

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition calling for the law on Sunday trading hours to be changed, to allow shops to stay open for longer, or for there to be no restrictions at all on Sunday opening.
